member.summary: I don't exactly know what this is supposed to do

member.summary: Gets the collection of all incompleted encode jobs from database

member.exception: Throws if: - Database connection times out

member.name: M:DataAccess.IEncodeJobDAO.MarkEncodeJobCheckedOut(System.Guid,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Changes the passed in jobs status to "Checked out", implying that the job is currently in progress or undergoing interrim evaluation.
member.exception: Throws if: - Database connection times out

member.summary: Changes the passed in jobs status to "Checked out at X time", implying that the job is currently in progress or undergoing interrim evaluation.
member.exception: Throws if: - Database connection times out

member.exception: Throws if: - Database connection times out

member.summary: Marks a designated encode job as completed

member.name: T:DataAccess.IFileAccessor
member.summary: Interface specifying basic, non-logical file based behavior/functionality

member.name: M:DataAccess.IFileAccessor.DoesFileExist(System.String)
member.summary: If the file path leads to an existing file.

member.name: M:DataAccess.IFileAccessor.MoveFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Moves a file
member.exception: Thrown if: - The old path to the file is invalid or the file is not found
Thrown if: - The path that the file is going to be move to is already occupied

member.name: M:DataAccess.IFileAccessor.DeleteFile(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a file

member.name: M:DataAccess.IFileAccessor.DoesFolderExist(System.String)
member.summary: If the folder path leads to an existing folder.

member.name: M:DataAccess.IFileAccessor.GetFilesInFolder(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the full paths of all files in a folder
member.exception: Thrown if: - The path to the folder is invalid or the folder is not found

member.name: M:DataAccess.IFileAccessor.GetFileSize(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the size in bytes of the specified file
member.exception: Thrown if: - The path to the file is invalid or the file is not found
